$$
% Sets
\def\R{\mathbb{R}}
\def\C{\mathbb{C}}
\def\N{\mathbb{N}}
\def\Z{\mathbb{Z}}
\def\Q{\mathbb{Q}}

% Linear Algebra
\def\bx{\mathbf{x}}
\def\by{\mathbf{y}}
\def\bz{\mathbf{z}}
\def\bu{\mathbf{u}}
\def\bv{\mathbf{v}}
\def\bw{\mathbf{w}}
\def\bA{\mathbf{A}}
\def\bB{\mathbf{B}}
\def\bI{\mathbf{I}}

% Operators
\def\norm#1{\left\lVert#1\right\rVert}
\def\inner#1#2{\langle #1, #2 \rangle}
\def\trace{\text{tr}}
\def\rank{\text{rank}}
\def\diag{\text{diag}}
\def\vspan{\text{span}}
$$
